meanings.sent1: That chucklehead always forgets his keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a chucklehead and double-check your work.
meanings.sent3: The chucklehead thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: He's such a chucklehead, his brain must be made of cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chucklehead tripping over his own feet stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: To call someone a chucklehead in a joking manner.
meanings.sent1: I chucklehead my brother when he tells his silly jokes.
meanings.sent2: Please don't chucklehead me in front of my friends.
meanings.sent3: She chuckleheads her cat when it chases its tail.
meanings.sent4: The comedian chuckleheaded the audience with his witty remarks.
meanings.sent5: I chucklehead you to lighten the mood during tense moments.
